title: Printer Troubleshooting Guide
description: Fix common printer connectivity and jamming issues.

steps.title: Check Power and Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure the printer is turned on and connected to the network or your computer via USB.

steps.title: Clear Print Queue
steps.instruction: Open 'Printers & Scanners' settings, select your printer, click 'Open Queue', and cancel any stuck documents.

steps.title: Check for Paper Jams
steps.instruction: Open the printer trays and access doors to check for any crumpled or stuck paper. Remove gently.

steps.title: Restart Printer Spooler
steps.instruction: On Windows, open Services (services.msc), find 'Print Spooler', right-click and select 'Restart'.

steps.title: Re-add Printer
steps.instruction: Remove the printer from your system settings and add it again.
